skills.name: Sawing Evil: Chop
skills.desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Sawing Evil: Sever
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Maddened
skills.desc: Enters the Maddened state at the start of battle. While in the Maddened state, uses Sawing Evil: Sever.
